name: Emancipsychic
description:
Travel the city avoiding enemies to gain freedom for psychics and establish a new international holiday!

Controls (Recommended Gamepad):

Gamepad (PS4 input map):

- Left Stick to move

- R1/L1 to select objects to control

- Hold X to throw objects at a direction

Keyboard

- Q/E to select objects to control

- Hold Space to throw objects at a direction

- Arrow keys to move
